trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Anaheim
There were no other sightings in Anaheim on or around March 20th 2003
Summary: Orange object hovers over Anaheim Hs., fires narro
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog when I looked up and saw a silent round orange light highin the east over Riverside heading west. It traveled directly overhead andproceeded to approx. Anaheim Hills where it stopped hovered. It then fired avery narrow beam to earth that had an electric or firey effect. I was waitingfor some kind of explosion, but none was heard. It then proceeded to the southeast and became progressively faint until it dissapeared.
